ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained
des: "This is a delicious appetizer to be served with the salsa of your choice. I have served this many times and have gotten rave reviews."
ins:
Mix cream cheese, sour cream, green chiles, green onions, garlic powder, and salt in a bowl. Spread cream cheese mixture onto each tortilla; tightly roll up tortillas.
Refrigerate rolls until firm, at least 2 hours. Cut rolls into 1-inch pieces.
